column4: hey, i downloaded a start button for gnome, how do I apply it as my menu icon?
are you using a custom folder icons or the default human ones?
ok, navigate to ~/.icons/       there should be a folder there called scalable apps?
in a terminal type                locate start-here | grep -i human
what was the name of the icon theme your using?
yeah, inhuman is the theme name
wheres the folder then? run             locate start-here | grep -i inhuman
then thats not the name of your icon theme
if i changed my theme back to normal, then could i use a different launcher icon?
